util.runtime

Interface CommandBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProgramArgument<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseProgramArgument, ClassPathJvmArg, CommandLineBuilder, JarCmdBuilder, JarJvmArg, JvmCmdBuilder, ListProgramArgument, MainClassCmdBuilder, SysPropJvmArg

    public interface CommandBuilder
    Builds the sequence of tokens that make up the string representation of a command to run an external program.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CommandBuilder empty()
      Convenience CommandBuilder that produces an empty sequence of tokens.
      default CommandBuilder join(CommandBuilder other)
      Makes a new command by appending the sequence of tokens in other to this sequence.
      java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> tokens()
      Builds the sequence of tokens that make up the string representation of this command, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • tokens

        java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> tokens()
        Builds the sequence of tokens that make up the string representation of this command, e.g. (pseudo code) [java, -cp, my.jar:ur.jar, app.Main].
        Returns:
        the list of tokens that make up this argument string.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the argument hasn't been set yet.

      • join

        default CommandBuilder join(CommandBuilder other)
        Makes a new command by appending the sequence of tokens in other to this sequence.

        Note. Command builders form a monoid under the "join token lists" operation; this method basically gives you the monoid's multiplication.

        Parameters:
        other - the other sequence of tokens.
        Returns:
        a new command having a sequence of tokens given by this sequence followed by that of other.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        See Also:
        empty

      • empty

        static CommandBuilder empty()
        Convenience CommandBuilder that produces an empty sequence of tokens.

        Note. Command builders form a monoid under the "join token lists" operation; this class represents the monoid's identity.

        Returns:
        the empty command builder.
        See Also:
        join
